initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome to Lilycove Department Store! Here we have raw brick materials for your base!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which resource would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which resource would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell our materials by stacks of 32. Would you like 32 Stone for $800?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=800..}] run give @s minecraft:stone 32');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=800..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=800..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 800');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

lines: Lovely. And here you are. Happy decorating!

q.dialogue.close();
